name: VRSpeed.run
desc:
VRSpeed.run is a central hub to view the leaderboards for the largest virtual reality games in speedrunning.

There are a few other projects such as a Twitter and Discord bot along side the website. Check them out at the GitHub organization below.

name: BigftioBot
desc: BigftioBot was a [Twitch](https://twitch.tv/) chat bot. Features included custom commands, quotes, moderation tools, and more.

name: URBot
desc:
URBot is a verified [Discord](https://discord.com/) bot made for the roleplaying web show [URealms](https://urealms.com/).

I stopped maintaining this bot in October 2019, however for now the bot is still active and can be added to new servers.

name: FCDisplay
desc:
FCDisplay was a mod for [Beat Saber](https://beatsaber.com/) that added a visual element to the game when the user hasn't missed a note.

I stopped maintaining the mod when an official version of this feature was added to the game.

name: ImmersiveMode
desc:
ImmersiveMode was a mod for [Beat Saber](https://beatsaber.com/) that disabled all UI while in a song, either just in-headset, just in the mirror, or both.

I stopped maintaining the mod when an official version of this feature was added to the game.

name: StreamInfo
desc:
StreamInfo was a mod for [Beat Saber](https://beatsaber.com/) that allowed players to display game info as an overlay on their streams or videos.

I stopped maintaining the mod when an official version of this feature was added to the game.
